GSD.description:
drm/gem: Fix GEM handle release errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.213 by commit bca46f2295fa921aa36eeba54070b94e726aeed8. For more details please see the references link.
